sen.j: 原田 左之助（はらだ さのすけ、天保11年（1840年） - 慶応4年5月17日 (旧暦)（1868年7月6日））は、新選組十番隊組長。
sen.e: Sanosuke HARADA (1840 - July 6, 1868) was the leader of the Tenth Unit of Shinsengumi.
Sanosuke HARADA (1840 - July 6, 1868) was the leader of the Tenth Unit of Shinsengumi.

sen.j: 伊予松山藩出身。
sen.e: He was born in the Iyo-Matsuyama Domain.
He was born in the Iyo-Matsuyama Domain.

sen.j: 諱は忠一。
sen.e: His Imina (personal name) was Tadakazu.

sen.j: 谷三十郎から種田流を教わり免許皆伝。
sen.e: He was trained in the Taneda-ryu Sojutsu School of spearmanship by Sanjuro TANI and received Menkyo-kaiden (full proficiency).
sen.cmt: 「種田流」では不明瞭なため「種田流槍術」と補足して訳しました。
sen.e: He was trained by Sanjuro TANI in the Taneda-ryu Sojutsu School of spearmanship and received Menkyo-kaiden (full proficiency).

sen.j: 伊予松山藩の武家奉公人だったが、のちに脱藩。
sen.e: He was a servant for a samurai family in the Iyo-Matsuyama Domain but later left the domain.

sen.j: 少々、短気な人物であったようだ。
sen.e: He seemed to be a little short tempered.

sen.j: ある武士と喧嘩をして「腹を切る作法も知らぬ下司め」と言われ、腹を切って見せた。
sen.e: When a certain samurai had a quarrel with him and said, "you are of low birth and don't even know how to commit seppuku," he actually demonstrated it by cutting his own belly.

sen.j: 傷は浅かったので命に別状は無かった。
sen.e: The cut was shallow and not life-threatening.

sen.j: その傷から、「死損ね左之助」と隊内でアダ名されたようである。
sen.e: For this wound, he was nicknamed in the group as "Sanosuke not dead yet."

sen.j: 腹に一文字の傷が残ったが、天気の良い日には傷を日にさらしながら「てめぇたちのようなヤワなとは違うんだ。俺の腹は金物の味を知ってるんだぜ」と言っていた。
sen.e: Although a straight line scar was left on his belly, he used to say, exposing the scar to the sun on a sunny day, "I am not soft like you guys. My belly knows the taste of metal."

sen.j: これを元に家紋を○に切腹傷の一文字を入れた形にした。
sen.e: That was why he adopted as his Kamon (family crest) the design of a circle combined with a straight line representing the scar.

sen.j: しかし、その反面、愛妻家であったともいわれている。
sen.e: He, however, was said to be a devoted husband.

sen.j: また、かなりの美男子だった。
sen.e: He was also rather handsome.

sen.cmt: この場合、「予想外」のニュアンスが感じられる"rather"よりは、肯定的な"quite"が良いと思いました。
sen.e: He was also quite handsome.

sen.j: 永倉新八とは仲が良かったようだ。
sen.e: Shinpachi NAGAKURA seemed to be close to him.

sen.j: また、かなりの暴れん坊だったこともあり、酒を飲んでは腹の傷を自慢したり、大声で「切れ切れ!」と叫んだという。
sen.e: He was rather rough, and when drunk, he boasted his scar or shouted loudly "kill, kill!"
He was quite rough, and when drunk, he would boast the scar on his belly or shout loudly "kill, kill!"
sen.cmt: この場合、「予想外」のニュアンスが感じられる"rather"よりは、肯定的な"quite"が良いと思い変更しました。過去によく行っていた行為について述べていると思われますので、動詞を二つとも"would + 動詞の原型"に変更しました。「腹の」が訳文に入っていなかったので、入れて"the scar on his belly"と変更しました。
sen.e: He was quite rough, and when drunk, he would boast the scar on his belly or shout loudly "kill, kill!"

sen.j: 長州藩の間者（スパイ）だったという楠小十郎を背後から斬り殺して「あぁ、良い気持ちだ」と言って笑っていた。
sen.e: After stabbing to death, from behind, Kojuro KUSUNOKI, a spy of the Choshu clan, he laughed and said, "Oh, I feel good."

sen.j: 近藤勇の江戸道場、試衛館以来の生え抜き隊士で十番隊組長となる。
sen.e: He had been in the group since he was training at Shieikan, Isami KONDO's dojo (training hall) in Edo, and became the leader of the Tenth Unit.

sen.j: 副長の土方歳三は、一番隊の沖田総司と十番隊の原田左之助を信頼して、よく使ったという。
sen.e: Toshizo HIJIKATA, the Vice Commander, trusted Soji OKITA of the First Unit and Sanosuke HARADA of the Tenth Unit, and often gave them tasks.

sen.j: 殿軍の組長として十番隊を指揮し主だった新選組の戦闘には原田の名が必ずあり活躍している。
sen.e: Harada participated in all major fights of Shinsengumi as the leader of the rear guard, the Tenth Unit.
Commanding the Tenth Unit as the leader of the rear guard, Harada participated in all major fights of Shinsengumi.

sen.j: （芹沢鴨一派の粛清、長州藩の間者・楠小十郎斬殺、大阪西町奉行与力・内山彦次郎暗殺、池田屋事件、禁門の変、三条制札事件、油小路事件など）
sen.e: (The purge of Kamo SERIZAWA's faction, killing of Kojuro KUSUNOKI who was a spy of the Choshu clan, assassination of Hikojiro UCHIYAMA who was a yoriki [police sergeant] of the Osaka-Nishimachi Magistrate's office, Ikedaya Incident, Kinmon Incident, Sanjo-ohashi Bridge Noticeboard Incident, Aburanokoji Incident and so on.)

sen.j: 2004年の日本放送協会大河ドラマ『新選組!』の中では、坂本龍馬暗殺犯が原田であるという当時の伝聞を上手く利用した描かれ方がされていた。
sen.e: "Shinsengumi!", the NHK Historical Drama of 2004 broadcasted by Japan Broadcasting Corporation, in its story, makes good use of the rumor spread at that time that Harada had assassinated Ryoma SAKAMOTO.

sen.e: He had fought as a member of Shinsengumi until the Battle of Toba-Fushimi and the campaign of Koyo Chinbutai (a military unit formed specially for the campaign in Kai Province), and then formed Seiheitai with Shinpachi NAGAKURA.
